message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL. 

The paper presents a novel approach for controlling information flow in neural networks for semantic segmentation tasks. This is a common problem in computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) research, and the paper proposes a new architecture for addressing this problem. The approach is based on a strong conceptual foundation and involves adaptive control of computation, which is a topic of interest in artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and neural networks (cs.NE). The paper also evaluates the proposed approach on three challenging datasets, which involves natural language processing (cs.CL) for pixel-wise labeling problems.
